mapper.select: SELECT al.id,al.name,al.insert_time insertTime,al.update_time updateTime FROM jxc_goods_lable jgl LEFT JOIN admin_lable al ON jgl.lable_id = al.id WHERE jgl.goods_id = #{_parameter} and al.id is not null

SELECT jg.id id, jg.NAME NAME, jg.price price, jg.price_unit_id priceUnitId, jg.size_unit_id sizeUnitId, jg.insert_time insertTime, jg.update_time updateTime, au1.NAME priceUnitName, au2.NAME sizeUnitName FROM jxc_goods jg LEFT JOIN admin_unit au1 ON jg.price_unit_id = au1.id LEFT JOIN admin_unit au2 ON jg.size_unit_id = au2.id
SELECT count(*) FROM jxc_goods jg LEFT JOIN admin_unit au1 ON jg.price_unit_id = au1.id LEFT JOIN admin_unit au2 ON jg.size_unit_id = au2.id
